displayName.brazilian: Prólogo da Batalha!
displayName.french: Prologue au combat !
displayName.japanese: 闘いの幕開け！
displayName.schinese: 战斗拉开序幕！
displayName.tchinese: 戰鬥拉開序幕！

description.brazilian: Completou o "Ataque de Raditz".
description.japanese: 強襲ラディッツ編をクリアした！
description.spanish: Completa "Ataque de Raditz".

displayName.brazilian: A Lenda Saiyajin Ressurge!
displayName.french: Renaissance de la légende saiyenne !
displayName.japanese: よみがえるサイヤ人伝説！
displayName.schinese: 苏醒的赛亚人传说！
displayName.tchinese: 甦醒的賽亞人傳說！

description.brazilian: Completou "A ameaça saiyajin".
description.japanese: 脅威のサイヤ人編をクリアした！
description.spanish: Completa "La amenaza Saiyan".

displayName.brazilian: O Surgimento da Batalha Feroz...
displayName.french: L'aube d'une bataille féroce...
displayName.japanese: 激戦の夜明け…
displayName.schinese: 激战后的黎明……
displayName.tchinese: 激戰後的黎明……

description.brazilian: Completou a "Confusão em Namekuseijin".
description.japanese: 乱戦ナメック星編をクリアした！
description.spanish: Completa "Alboroto en el planeta Namek".

displayName.brazilian: A Arma Secreta de Freeza!
displayName.french: L'arme secrète de Freezer !
displayName.japanese: フリーザの秘密兵器！
displayName.schinese: 弗力札的秘密武器！
displayName.tchinese: 弗力札的祕密武器！

description.brazilian: Completou "Os ataques das Forças Ginyu".
description.japanese: 激突・ギニュー特戦隊編をクリアした！
description.schinese: 完成冲突・基钮特战队篇！
description.spanish: Completa "La Fuerza Ginyu ataca".
description.tchinese: 完成衝突・基鈕特戰隊篇！

displayName.brazilian: O Lendário Guerreiro Despertado...
displayName.french: L'éveil d'un guerrier légendaire...
displayName.japanese: 目覚めろ伝説の戦士…
displayName.schinese: 传说中的战士　觉醒吧……
displayName.tchinese: 傳說中的戰士　覺醒吧……

description.brazilian: Completou "O imperador galáctico".
description.japanese: 宇宙の帝王編をクリアした！
description.spanish: Completa "El emperador galáctico".

displayName.brazilian: O Sucessor do Mais Forte
displayName.french: Le successeur des plus forts
displayName.japanese: 最強を継ぐ者…
displayName.schinese: 最强的继承者……
displayName.tchinese: 最強的繼承者……

description.brazilian: Completou o "Combate androide".
description.japanese: 激闘・人造人間編をクリアした！
description.spanish: Completa "Guerra de los androides".

displayName.brazilian: O Espírito de Goku é Eterno!
displayName.english: The Spirit of Goku is Forever!
displayName.french: L'esprit de Son Goku est éternel !
displayName.german: Der Geist von Son-Goku lebt ewig!
displayName.italian: Lo spirito di Goku è eterno!
displayName.japanese: 魂よ永遠に
displayName.schinese: 永恒不灭的灵魂
displayName.tchinese: 永恆不滅的靈魂

description.brazilian: Completou "Um futuro desesperador".
description.japanese: 絶望の未来編をクリアした！
description.spanish: Completa "Un futuro desesperado".

displayName.brazilian: Aproveite O Futuro!!
displayName.french: Empare-toi du futur !
displayName.german: Mach dir die Zukunft zu eigen!!
displayName.japanese: 未来をつかめ！！
displayName.schinese: 抓住未来！！
displayName.tchinese: 抓住未來！！

description.brazilian: Completou "Batalha decisiva com Majin Boo".
description.japanese: 決戦・魔人ブウ編をクリアした！
description.russian: Завершите эпизод "Решающая битва с Маджин Буу".
description.schinese: 完成决战・魔人普乌篇！
description.spanish: Completa "Combate decisivo contra Bu".
description.tchinese: 完成決戰・魔人普烏篇！

displayName.brazilian: A Batalha dos Deuses Chega ao Fim!
displayName.french: Conclusion de la bataille des dieux !
displayName.german: Das Ende des Kampfes der Götter!
displayName.italian: La battaglia fra dei si conclude!
displayName.japanese: 決着！神と神
displayName.schinese: 一决高下！神与神
displayName.spanish: ¡La Batalla de los dioses ha terminado!
displayName.tchinese: 一決高下！神與神

description.brazilian: Completou "A ira do Deus da Destruição".
description.french: Terminer "Colère du dieu de la destruction".
description.japanese: 破壊神の怒り編をクリアした！
description.spanish: Completa "Furia del Dios de la Destrucción".

displayName.brazilian: Desespero Outra Vez!
displayName.french: Désespoir, une fois de plus !
displayName.japanese: 絶望ふたたび！
displayName.schinese: 绝望再临！
displayName.tchinese: 絕望再臨！

description.brazilian: Completou "A volta do imperador".
description.japanese: 復活の帝王編をクリアした！
description.spanish: Completa "El regreso del emperador".

displayName.brazilian: O Sonho de Goku é Colossal!
displayName.french: Le rêve de Son Goku est immense !
displayName.italian: Il sogno di Goku è immenso!
displayName.japanese: もっと強く！！夢は超でっけえ
displayName.schinese: 要再更强！！梦想超远大
displayName.spanish: ¡El sueño de Son Goku es inmenso!
displayName.tchinese: 要再更強！！夢想超遠大

description.brazilian: Assistiu à sequência final.
description.japanese: エンディングを見た！
description.spanish: Ve la secuencia final.

displayName.brazilian: Ousadia Diante do Desespero!!
displayName.english: Defiance in the Face of Despair!!
displayName.french: Au mépris du désespoir !
displayName.japanese: 放たれた運命 絶望への反抗！！
displayName.schinese: 被放逐的宿命　抵抗绝望！！
displayName.tchinese: 被放逐的宿命　抵抗絕望！！

description.brazilian: Completou "História desconhecida".
description.japanese: 知られざる歴史編をクリアした！
description.schinese: 完成需要隐藏的历史篇！
description.spanish: Completa "Historia desconocida".
description.tchinese: 完成需要隱藏的歷史篇！

displayName.brazilian: Prepare-se Para Morrer!
displayName.french: Prépare-toi à mourir !
displayName.japanese: さぁ…始めようかっ！！！
displayName.schinese: 来……开始吧！！！
displayName.tchinese: 來……開始吧！！！

description.brazilian: Passou no teste da Turma Fácil.
description.french: Réussir le test de catégorie facile.
description.italian: Supera il test di avanzamento Principiante.
description.japanese: 初級クラスを合格した！
description.spanish: Supera la prueba de progreso fácil.

displayName.brazilian: Me Matar Não Bastará!
displayName.english: It Won't Be Enough to Kill Me!
displayName.french: Ça ne suffira pas à me tuer
displayName.german: Das reicht nicht, um mich zu töten!
displayName.japanese: このオレを超えることはできぬ！！
displayName.polish: To za mało, by mnie zabić!
displayName.russian: Этого не хватит, чтобы меня убить
displayName.schinese: 你不可能超越我！！
displayName.tchinese: 你不可能超越我！！

description.brazilian: Passou no teste da Turma Kaiohshin.
description.french: Réussir le test de catégorie Kaïo.
description.italian: Supera il test di avanzamento Kaioh.
description.japanese: 改級クラスを合格した！
description.spanish: Supera la prueba de progreso Kaiyoshin.

displayName.brazilian: Quer Ser o Próximo Deus da Destruição?
displayName.english: Want to Be the Next God of Destruction?
displayName.french: Tu veux devenir le dieu de la destruction ?
displayName.german: Willst du Gott der Zerstörung werden?
displayName.italian: Vuoi essere il nuovo Dio della distruzione?
displayName.japanese: あなた次の破壊神になりませんか？
displayName.russian: Ты хочешь стать следующим богом разрушения?
displayName.schinese: 你要不要成为下一位破坏神啊？
displayName.spanish: ¿Quieres ser el dios de la destrucción?
displayName.tchinese: 你要不要成為下一位破壞神啊？

description.brazilian: Passou no teste da Turma Super.
description.french: Réussir le test de catégorie super.
description.italian: Supera il test di avanzamento Super.
description.japanese: 超級クラスを合格した！
description.spanish: Supera la prueba de progreso Súper.

displayName.brazilian: Shenlong, Eu Te Invoco!
displayName.french: J'invoque maintenant Shenron !
displayName.japanese: サンキュー！！ドラゴンボール！！！
displayName.schinese: 谢啦！！龙珠！！！
displayName.tchinese: 謝啦！！龍珠！！！

description.brazilian: Coletou 7 Esferas do Dragão e invocou Shenlong!
description.english: Gathered 7 Dragon Balls and summoned Shenron!
description.french: Rassembler les 7 Dragon Balls et invoquer Shenron !
description.german: Sieben Dragonballs gesammelt und Shenlong gerufen!
description.italian: Raccogli le 7 Sfere del Drago ed evoca Shenron!
description.japanese: ドラゴンボールを７つ集めて神龍を呼び出した！
description.koreana: 드래곤볼 일곱 개를 모아 신룡을 불러냈다!
description.polish: Zebrano 7 smoczych kul i przywołano Shenrona!
description.russian: Собрано 7 драконьих жемчужин и призван Шенрон!
description.schinese: 收集到7颗龙珠，叫出神龙！
description.spanish: ¡Has reunido 7 Bolas Dragón y has invocado a Shenron!
description.tchinese: 收集到7顆龍珠，叫出神龍！

displayName.brazilian: Vim por Sua Causa!
displayName.french: Je viens pour toi !
displayName.german: Ich bin gekommen, um dich zu vernichten!
displayName.japanese: オレは貴様を倒す者だッ！！
displayName.schinese: 我就是要打倒你的人！！
displayName.tchinese: 我就是要打倒你的人！！

description.brazilian: Desbloqueou todos os personagens e variações!
description.french: Déverrouiller tous les personnages et leurs variantes !
description.italian: Sblocca tutti i personaggi e le varianti!
description.japanese: 全てのキャラクターとそのバリエーションが使用可能になった！
description.koreana: 모든 캐릭터와 그 바리에이션을 사용할 수 있게 되었다!
description.polish: Odblokowano wszystkie postacie i ich wersje!
description.schinese: 包含角色的其他型态在内，已可使用全部角色！
description.spanish: ¡Has desbloqueado todos los personajes y sus variantes!
description.tchinese: 包含角色的其他型態在內，已可使用全部角色！

displayName.brazilian: Você Não Para Mesmo!
displayName.french: Tu sais y faire !
displayName.italian: Certo che non stai mai fermo!
displayName.japanese: ビシッ
displayName.schinese: 咻
displayName.tchinese: 咻

description.brazilian: Visitou todos os estágios!
description.japanese: ステージセレクトで選択できる全てのステージに行った！
description.koreana: 스테이지 셀렉트로 선택할 수 있는 모든 스테이지에 갔다!
description.schinese: 已去过“选择关卡”中所有可去的关卡！
description.spanish: ¡Has visitado todos los niveles!
description.tchinese: 已去過「選擇關卡」中所有可去的關卡！

displayName.brazilian: Que Tal um Aquecimento?
displayName.french: Un petit échauffement ?
displayName.italian: Che ne dici di un po' di riscaldamento?
displayName.japanese: わたしのウォーミングアップを手伝ってくれるかな？
displayName.schinese: 来帮我做暖身运动吧
displayName.tchinese: 來幫我做暖身運動吧

description.brazilian: Participou pela primeira vez de Batalhas Online!
description.english: Played Online Battles for the first time!
description.french: Faire un combat en ligne pour la première fois !
description.german: Zum ersten Mal einen Online-Kampf bestritten!
description.italian: Affronta per la prima volta delle battaglie online!
description.japanese: オンライン対戦に参加した！
description.polish: Rozegrano walkę sieciową po raz pierwszy!
description.spanish: ¡Has jugado un combate en línea por 1.ª vez!

displayName.brazilian: A Vitória é Minha!
displayName.french: La victoire m'appartient !
displayName.japanese: よっしゃーーっ！！！

description.brazilian: Venceu 7 vezes em rede!
description.japanese: オンライン対戦で7勝した！
description.spanish: ¡Has ganado 7 veces en línea!

displayName.brazilian: Das Minhas Lutas, Você é o 2º Rival + Forte
displayName.english: Of All My Fights You're My 2nd Strongest Foe
displayName.french: De mes adversaires, tu es le 2e plus fort
displayName.german: Du bist bis jetzt mein zweitstärkster Gegner
displayName.italian: Sei il secondo avversario più forte per me
displayName.japanese: 長い長い闘いの歴史のなかでも2番目に強かった…
displayName.koreana: 길고 긴 싸움의 역사 속에서도 두 번째로 강했다…
displayName.russian: Из всех моих врагов лишь один сильнее тебя
displayName.schinese: 在我长久的战斗史上　你是我碰到第2强的对手……
displayName.spanish: Eres mi segundo oponente más fuerte
displayName.tchinese: 在我長久的戰鬥史上　你是我碰到第2強的對手……

description.brazilian: Venceu batalha sem fim 7 vezes!
description.french: Gagner 7 fois en mode combat infini !
description.japanese: エンドレスバトルで7勝した！
description.spanish: ¡Has conseguido 7 victorias en combate eterno!

displayName.brazilian: Você é Não Merece Me Enfrentar!
displayName.english: You're Not Worthy of Fighting Me!
displayName.french: Tu ne mérites pas de m'affronter !
displayName.german: Du bist nicht würdig, gegen mich zu kämpfen!
displayName.japanese: その程度の戦闘力では今のオレの相手にはなれないぜ！
displayName.koreana: 그 정도 전투력으론 지금 내 상대는 안 된다고!
displayName.polish: Nie zniżę się do walki z tobą!
displayName.russian: Ты не заслуживаешь драться со мной!
displayName.schinese: 凭这点程度的战斗力　没办法和现在的我为敌！
displayName.spanish: ¡No eres digno de enfrentarte a mí!
displayName.tchinese: 憑這點程度的戰鬥力　沒辦法和現在的我為敵！

description.brazilian: Mais de 50% de Missões Paralelas Completadas!
description.english: Parallel Quest completion rate is over 50%!
description.french: Terminer plus de 50 % des quêtes parallèles !
description.italian: Completa oltre il 50% delle missioni parallele!
description.japanese: パラレルクエストの達成率が50%以上になった！
description.polish: Wskaźnik ukończenia zadań równoległych wynosi ponad 50%!
description.schinese: 平行任务的达标率到50％以上！
description.spanish: ¡Has completado más del 50% de las misiones secundarias!
description.tchinese: 平行任務的達成率到50％以上！

displayName.brazilian: Você é o 2º Rival a Me Pressionar Assim!
displayName.english: You're the Second Foe to Push Me This Far!
displayName.french: Tu es le deuxième à m'avoir poussé si loin !
displayName.german: Der Zweite, der mich so weit getrieben hat!
displayName.italian: Solo un altro nemico mi aveva impegnato così
displayName.japanese: オラをここまでさせたのはおめぇが魔人ブウに続いて二人目だ！
displayName.koreana: 날 이 정도로 만든 건 마인 부우에 이어 네가 두 명 째다!
displayName.polish: Jesteś drugim wrogiem, który dał mi w kość!
displayName.russian: До тебя лишь один был так силен!
displayName.schinese: 能把我逼到这地步的　你是继魔人普乌之后第2个！
displayName.spanish: ¡Eres el segundo que me lleva tan lejos!
displayName.tchinese: 能把我逼到這地步的　你是繼魔人普烏之後第2個！

description.brazilian: Concluiu todas as Missões Paralelas!
description.japanese: 全てのパラレルクエストをクリアした！
description.schinese: 完成全部的平行任务了！
description.spanish: ¡Has completado todas las misiones secundarias!
description.tchinese: 完成全部的平行任務了！

displayName.brazilian: Se Eu Não Fizer, Quem Fará?
displayName.english: If I Don't Do It, Who Will?
displayName.french: Si je ne le fais pas, qui le fera ?
displayName.german: Wenn ich es nicht tue, wer dann?
displayName.italian: Se non lo farò io, allora chi?
displayName.japanese: オレがやらなきゃ誰がやる！
displayName.polish: Kto to zrobi, jeśli nie ja?
displayName.schinese: 舍我其谁！
displayName.spanish: Si no lo hago yo, ¿quién lo hará?
displayName.tchinese: 捨我其誰！

description.brazilian: Completar 7 Missões Especializadas.
description.japanese: エキスパートミッションを7回クリアした！
description.spanish: Completa 7 misiones de experto.

displayName.brazilian: Você é Mesmo um Herói!
displayName.french: Tu es vraiment un héros !
displayName.japanese: おめえはホントに世界の救世主かもな！！！！
displayName.schinese: 说不定你真的是这个世界的救世主！！！！
displayName.tchinese: 說不定你真的是這個世界的救世主！！！！

description.brazilian: Completar todas as Missões Especializadas.
description.japanese: 全てのエキスパートミッションをクリアした！
description.schinese: 完成全部的专家任务了！
description.spanish: Completa todas las misiones de experto.
description.tchinese: 完成全部的專家任務了！

displayName.brazilian: Nasce O Majin Mais Poderoso!
displayName.english: The Most Powerful Majin is Born!
displayName.french: Le Majin le plus puissant est né !
displayName.italian: È nato il Majin più potente!
displayName.japanese: にどと現れぬであろう 最強の魔人の誕生だ
displayName.koreana: 두 번 다시는 나타나지 않을 최강의 마인 탄생이다
displayName.schinese: 最强的魔人诞生了　这恐怕不会再有第2次了吧
displayName.tchinese: 最強的魔人誕生了　這恐怕不會再有第2次了吧

description.brazilian: Provocar o nascimento de um Majin.
description.english: Cause a Majin to be born.
description.german: Für die Geburt eines Majin gesorgt.
description.japanese: 魔人を誕生させた！
description.spanish: Haz que nazca un monstruo.

displayName.brazilian: Me Sinto um Pouco... Diferente!
displayName.french: Je me sens... différent !
displayName.japanese: オレがオレじゃなくなる！！
displayName.schinese: 我会变得不是我了！！
displayName.tchinese: 我會變得不是我了！！

description.brazilian: Provocar a mudança de um Majin.
description.german: Dafür gesorgt, dass ein Majin sich verändert.
description.japanese: 魔人を変化させた！
description.spanish: Haz que un monstruo cambie.

displayName.brazilian: Você Não Trabalharia pra Mim, Né?
displayName.english: You Wouldn't Want to Work for Me, Would You?
displayName.french: Tu ne voudrais pas travailler pour moi ?
displayName.german: Du willst nicht zufällig für mich arbeiten?
displayName.italian: Non è che lavoreresti per me, vero?
displayName.japanese: ボクの下で働いてみる気はないか？
displayName.polish: Pewnie nie zechcesz dla mnie pracować?
displayName.schinese: 你有没有意思在我底下工作？
displayName.tchinese: 你有沒有意思在我底下工作？

description.brazilian: Entrar na Força Freeza.
description.japanese: フリーザ軍に入隊した！
description.spanish: Únete al ejército galáctico de Freezer.

displayName.brazilian: Farei de Você Comandante do Exército Freeza.
displayName.english: I'll Make You Commander of the Frieza Force
displayName.french: Je te nomme commandant des forces de Freezer
displayName.italian: Ti metterò a capo delle forze di Freezer
displayName.japanese: あなたをフリーザ軍の最高司令官にしてあげます
displayName.koreana: 당신을 프리저 군단 최고 사령관으로 임명하죠
displayName.russian: Я сделаю тебя командующим армии Фризы
displayName.schinese: 我命令你就任统领弗力札军的最高司令官
displayName.spanish: Te nombro comandante del ejército de Freezer
displayName.tchinese: 我命令你就任統領弗力札軍的最高司令官

description.brazilian: Tornar-se o segundo em comando de Freeza.
description.french: Devenir commandant en second de Freezer.
description.japanese: フリーザ軍の右腕になった！
description.schinese: 成为弗力札的左右手了！
description.spanish: Conviértete en el segundo de Freezer.
description.tchinese: 成為弗力札的左右手了！

displayName.brazilian: Permita-me Despertar Esse Poder pra Você
displayName.english: Allow Me to Awaken This Power for You
displayName.french: Laisse-moi éveiller ta puissance
displayName.italian: Lascia che risvegli la tua potenza
displayName.japanese: その力を起こしてさしあげましょう
displayName.polish: Pozwól, że przebudzę tę moc dla ciebie
displayName.russian: Позволь пробудить эту силу для тебя
displayName.schinese: 我来让你的力量觉醒吧
displayName.spanish: Déjame despertar este poder para ti
displayName.tchinese: 我來讓你的力量覺醒吧

description.brazilian: Desbloquear um bônus em atributo.
description.italian: Sblocca un miglioramento di un attributo.
description.japanese: 能力強化を解放した！
description.spanish: Desbloquea un potenciador de atributo.

displayName.brazilian: Takkaraput Pop Porunga Pupiritt Paro!
displayName.french: Takkaraput pop porunga pupiritt paro !
displayName.japanese: タッカラプト ポッポルンガ プピリットパロ
displayName.schinese: 达喀尔波普多　波波路亚　普比利多巴洛
displayName.tchinese: 達卡波普多　波波路亞　普比利多巴洛

description.brazilian: Reforçar os desejos de Shenlong.
description.french: Augmenter la puissance des vœux de Shenron.
description.japanese: 神龍の願い事を強化した！
description.schinese: 增加可以向神龙许下的愿望了！
description.spanish: Aumenta la potencia de los deseos de Shenron.
description.tchinese: 增加可以向神龍許下的願望了！

displayName.brazilian: Cale-se e Ponha Isto no Seu Ouvido Direito!
displayName.english: Shut Up and Put This on Your Right Ear!
displayName.french: Tais-toi et mets ça sur ton oreille droite !
displayName.german: Halt den Mund und steck das ans rechte Ohr!
displayName.japanese: だまってこいつを右の耳につけてくれ！！
displayName.polish: Zamknij się i załóż to na prawe ucho!
displayName.russian: Замолчи и надень это на правое ухо!
displayName.schinese: 把这个戴到右耳上就对了啦！！！
displayName.spanish: ¡Cállate y ponte esto en la oreja derecha!
displayName.tchinese: 把這個戴到右耳上就對了啦！！！

description.brazilian: Criar um QQ Bang.
description.japanese: QQバンを作成した！
description.spanish: Crea un QQ Bang.

displayName.brazilian: Você é o Número 1!
displayName.french: Tu es numéro 1 !
displayName.japanese: おまえがナンバー1だ！！
displayName.schinese: 你是世界第一！！
displayName.tchinese: 你是世界第一！！

description.brazilian: Fazer com que Vegeta reconheça sua força.
description.english: Get Vegeta to acknowledge your strength.
description.french: Obliger Vegeta à reconnaître ta force.
description.german: Von Vegeta deine Stärke anerkannt bekommen.
description.italian: Fai in modo che Vegeta riconosca la tua forza.
description.japanese: ベジータに認められた！
description.polish: Zmuś Vegetę, by uznał twoją siłę.
description.spanish: Consigue que Vegeta reconozca tu fuerza.

displayName.brazilian: Minha Barriga Dói!
displayName.french: Oh, mon ventre ! Ça fait mal
displayName.japanese: きゅうにハラが…！！
displayName.schinese: 肚子突然有状况……！！
displayName.tchinese: 肚子突然有狀況……！！

description.brazilian: Receber uma Recompensa de Mr. Satan.
description.english: Receive an SP Reward from Hercule.
description.french: Recevoir une récompense spéciale de M. Satan.
description.german: Eine Spezial-Belohnung von Mr. Satan erhalten.
description.italian: Ricevi una ricompensa speciale da Mr. Satan.
description.japanese: サタンからSP報酬をもらった！
description.polish: Odbierz nagrodę SP od Mister Satana.
description.schinese: 从撒旦手中取得当保镳的酬劳了！
description.spanish: Recibe una recompensa especial de Mr. Satan.
description.tchinese: 從撒旦手中取得當保鑣的酬勞了！

displayName.brazilian: O Mal Deve Temer! Os Justos Devem Florescer!
displayName.french: Le mal doit céder sa place au bien !
displayName.german: Böses muss zittern, Gerechtes muss siegen!
displayName.italian: Il male deve svanire e il bene fiorire!
displayName.japanese: この世に悪がある限り！正義の怒りが炎と燃える！
displayName.koreana: 이 세계에 악인이 있는 한! 정의의 분노가 불타오른다!
displayName.schinese: 只要这世界上有邪恶存在！正义的愤怒就会与火焰一同燃烧！
displayName.tchinese: 只要這世界上有邪惡存在！正義的憤怒就會與火焰一同燃燒！

description.brazilian: Tornar-se aprendiz dos Grandes Saiyamen e derrotar todos os vilões.
description.english: Become a student of the Great Saiyamen and defeat all the villains.
description.french: Devenir un étudiant des Great Saiyaman et vaincre tous les méchants !
description.german: Ein Schüler des Großen Saiyaman geworden und alle Bösewichte besiegt.
description.italian: Diventa allievo di Great Saiyaman e sconfiggi tutti i malvagi.
description.japanese: グレートサイヤマンの弟子となって全ての悪を倒した！
description.koreana: 그레이트 사이어맨의 제자가 되어 모든 악인을 물리쳤다!
description.polish: Zostań uczniem Wielkich Saiyamenów i pokonaj wszystkich łotrów.
description.russian: Станьте учеником Великих Сайяманов и победите всех злодеев.
description.schinese: 成为赛亚超人的弟子，打倒所有邪恶！
description.spanish: Conviértete en discípulo de los Grandes Saiyaman y derrota a los villanos.
description.tchinese: 成為賽亞超人的弟子，打倒所有邪惡！

displayName.brazilian: Aqui, Seu Molenga...
displayName.french: Par ici, feignant...
displayName.japanese: こっちだ ウスノロ…
displayName.schinese: 是这边　迟钝的家伙……
displayName.tchinese: 是這邊　遲鈍的傢伙……

description.brazilian: Aprender todas as Técnicas Despertadas de todas as raças das grandes fendas temporais.
description.english: Learn all possible Awoken Skills for each race from the large time rifts.
description.french: Apprendre tous les Éveils de chaque race dans les grandes failles temporelles.
description.german: Alle Erwachen-Fähigkeiten für alle Spezies von den großen Zeitspalten gelernt.
description.italian: Impara le abilità risvegliate di tutte le razze nelle grandi faglie temporali.
description.japanese: 巨大な時の裂け目で種族毎に習得できる覚醒技を全て習得した！
description.koreana: 거대한 시간의 틈새에서 종족별로 습득할 수 있는 각성기를 전부 습득했다!
description.polish: Naucz się wszystkich dostępnych rozbudzonych umiejętności dla każdej rasy z dużych szczelin czasu.
description.russian: Изучите все возможные пробужденные приемы для всех рас в крупных временных расселинах.
description.schinese: 在巨大时空裂缝中，学会自己的种族可以学习的全部觉醒技！
description.spanish: Aprende todas las habilidades despertadas de cada raza en las grandes fallas temporales.
description.tchinese: 在巨大時空裂縫中，學會自己的種族可以學習的全部覺醒技！

displayName.brazilian: Povo da Terra, Me Conceda Sua Energia!
displayName.english: People of Earth, Please Lend Me Your Energy!
displayName.french: Terriens, nourrissez-moi de votre énergie !
displayName.german: Erdenbürger, teilt eure Energie mit mir!
displayName.japanese: 大地よ 海よ 空よ そして生きているすべてのみんな
displayName.koreana: 대지여, 바다여, 하늘이여, 그리고 살아있는 모두들
displayName.russian: Люди Земли, поделитесь со мной своей силой!
displayName.schinese: 大地　海洋　天空啊　还有生活其中的所有生命啊
displayName.tchinese: 大地　海洋　天空啊　還有生活其中的所有生命啊

description.brazilian: Coletar metade de todas as técnicas.
description.french: Obtenir la moitié de toutes les techniques.
description.italian: Ottieni metà di tutte le abilità.
description.japanese: 技を半分集めた！
description.spanish: Consigue la mitad de todas las habilidades.

displayName.brazilian: Os Bandidos Usam Roupas Mais Legais
displayName.english: The Bad Guys Always Wear the Coolest Clothes
displayName.french: Les méchants ont toujours le meilleur look
displayName.german: Die Bösen tragen immer die besten Kleider
displayName.italian: I cattivi hanno sempre un look fenomenale!
displayName.japanese: 地球をなめるなよ……！！
displayName.polish: Źli kolesie zawsze noszą niezłe wdzianka
displayName.schinese: 不要小看地球……！！
displayName.spanish: Los malos llevan la ropa más chula
displayName.tchinese: 不要小看地球……！！

description.brazilian: Coletar metade de todos os equipamentos.
description.french: Obtenir la moitié de tous les équipements.
description.italian: Ottieni metà di tutti gli equipaggiamenti.
description.japanese: 装備を半分集めた！
description.spanish: Consigue la mitad de todo el equipo.

displayName.brazilian: Você Não Pode Destruir o Verdadeiro Eu!
displayName.english: You Can't Destroy What I Really Am!
displayName.french: Tu ne peux détruire ce que je suis !
displayName.german: Du kannst mein wahres Ich nicht vernichten!
displayName.italian: Non puoi distruggere ciò che sono veramente!
displayName.japanese: この肉体が滅んでも！！オレの意思を継ぐ者が必ず立ちあがり…そして
displayName.koreana: 이 육체가 스러져도!! 내 의지를 잇는 자가 반드시 일어선다… 그리고
displayName.polish: Nie zniszczysz tego, kim naprawdę jestem!
displayName.schinese: 就算这肉体毁灭了！！也会有人继承我的意志站起来……
displayName.tchinese: 就算這肉體毀滅了！！也會有人繼承我的意志站起來……

description.brazilian: Coletar 50% de todos os apelidos e ver a lista (Exceto apelidos de eventos.)
description.english: Collect 50% of nicknames and view the nickname list.
description.french: Obtenir la moitié des pseudos et les consulter.
description.german: Die Hälfte aller Spitznamen gesammelt und angesehen.
description.italian: Ottieni metà dei nickname e visualizzali.
description.japanese: 通り名を半分集めて、通り名リストを確認した！
description.koreana: 통칭을 절반 모으고, 통칭 리스트를 확인하였다!
description.polish: Zbierz połowę ksywek i obejrzyj listę ksywek.
description.russian: Соберите 50% прозвищ и просмотрите список прозвищ.
description.schinese: 收集到一半的昵称后，确认过昵称表了！
description.spanish: Consigue la mitad de todos los apodos y revisa la lista.
description.tchinese: 收集到一半的暱稱後，確認過暱稱表了！

displayName.brazilian: É Melhor Usar a Câmara Hiperbólica do Tempo
displayName.english: We Better Use the Hyperbolic Time Chamber...
displayName.french: Utilisons la Salle de l'Esprit et du Temps
displayName.german: Benutzen wir den Raum von Geist und Zeit ...
displayName.italian: Usiamo la Stanza dello Spirito e del Tempo!
displayName.japanese: たった1日で1年間の修業ができる所へ…
displayName.koreana: 단 하루 만에 일 년간의 수행을 할 수 있는 곳으로…
displayName.polish: Lepiej chodźmy użyć Komnaty Ducha i Czasu...
displayName.schinese: 去花1天就可以修练1年的地方吧……
displayName.spanish: Mejor usar la Cámara del Tiempo Hiperbólico
displayName.tchinese: 去花1天就可以修練1年的地方吧……

description.brazilian: Completar todas as Missões de Desafio.
description.japanese: チャレンジクエストを全てクリアした！
description.spanish: Completa todas las misiones desafío.

displayName.brazilian: Cuide da Sua Mãe Por Mim...
displayName.english: Take Care of Your Mom for Me...
displayName.french: Prends soin de ta mère pour moi...
displayName.german: Kümmer dich für mich um deine Mutter ...
displayName.japanese: ママを大切にしろよ…
displayName.schinese: 要好好照顾妈妈……
displayName.spanish: Cuida de tu madre por mí...
displayName.tchinese: 要好好照顧媽媽……

description.brazilian: Libertar todos os aliados sob controle mental.
description.english: Free all allies who were put under mind control.
description.french: Libérer tous les alliés sous contrôle mental.
description.german: Alle Verbündeten, die unter Gedankenkontrolle stehen, befreit.
description.italian: Libera tutti gli alleati caduti sotto controllo mentale.
description.japanese: 洗脳状態に陥った味方を助けた！
description.polish: Uwolnij wszystkich sojuszników znajdujących się pod kontrolą umysłu.
description.russian: Освободите всех союзников от контроля над разумом.
description.schinese: 帮助了陷入洗脑状态的同伴！
description.spanish: Libera a todos los aliados bajo control mental.
description.tchinese: 幫助了陷入洗腦狀態的同伴！

displayName.brazilian: Até a Próxima!
displayName.french: À bientôt !
displayName.japanese: またな！
displayName.schinese: 再见啦！
displayName.tchinese: 再見啦！

description.brazilian: Repelir com sucesso uma Explosão Ki gigante.
description.english: Successfully repel a Gigantic Ki Blast.
description.french: Réussir à repousser un gigantesque Kikoha.
description.italian: Respingi con successo un Colpo dell'aura gigante.
description.japanese: 超気弾を押し返すのに成功した！
description.schinese: 成功把超级气弹压制回去！
description.spanish: Repele con éxito una Ráfaga Ki gigante.
description.tchinese: 成功把超級氣彈壓制回去！

displayName.brazilian: Tra La La La La La!
displayName.english: Tra La La La La La!
displayName.french: Tra La La La La La !
displayName.german: Tra La La La La La!
displayName.italian: Tra la la la la la!
displayName.japanese: スキップスキップランラララン♪
displayName.polish: Tra La La La La La!
displayName.schinese: 我左跳　我右跳　啦啦啦啦啦♪
displayName.tchinese: 我左跳　我右跳　啦啦啦啦啦♪

description.brazilian: Completar 10 sessões de treinamento do Kuririn.
description.italian: Completa 10 sessioni di allenamento di Crilin.
description.japanese: クリリンの修業を10回クリアした！
description.spanish: Completa 10 de las sesiones de entrenamiento de Krilin.

displayName.brazilian: Essa Pedra Deve Ser um Truque! Deixe-me Ver
displayName.english: That Stone Might Be a Decoy! Let Me Check It
displayName.french: Cette pierre peut être un leurre, je vérifie
displayName.german: Der Stein könnte ein Köder sein! Lass mich!
displayName.italian: Forse quella pietra è un'esca! Ora controllo
displayName.japanese: ホントにあの石か～？ちょっとかしてみろよ
displayName.koreana: 진짜 그 돌이야~? 잠깐 보여줘 봐
displayName.polish: Ten kamień może być zmyłką! Sprawdzę to
displayName.russian: Этот камень может быть приманкой! Я проверю
displayName.schinese: 真的是那个石头吗？　借我看一下嘛
displayName.spanish: ¡Esa piedra puede ser un señuelo! Iré a ver
displayName.tchinese: 真的是那個石頭嗎？　借我看一下嘛

description.brazilian: Completar 10 sessões de treinamento do Yamcha.
description.italian: Completa 10 sessioni di allenamento di Yamcha.
description.japanese: ヤムチャの修業を10回クリアした！
description.spanish: Completa 10 de las sesiones de entrenamiento de Yamcha.

displayName.brazilian: Concentre-se Não num Lugar, mas numa Pessoa
displayName.english: Focus Hard - Not on a Place, But on a Person
displayName.french: Visualise. Pas un lieu, mais une personne
displayName.german: Konzentriere dich - Kein Ort, eine Person
displayName.italian: Concentrati. Su una persona, non un luogo
displayName.japanese: 場所じゃなくて人を思いうかべるんだ
displayName.polish: Koncentruj się nie na miejscu, ale na osobie
displayName.russian: Сосредоточься - не на месте, а на человеке
displayName.schinese: 不是想着地点　而是去想你要见到的人
displayName.spanish: Céntrate en una persona, no un lugar
displayName.tchinese: 不是想著地點　而是去想你要見到的人

description.brazilian: Desbloquear todos os pontos de distorção.
description.english: Interact with Time Miniatures in all Bases.
description.french: Interagir avec toutes les Maquettes du temps de Conton City.
description.german: Interagiere mit allen Zeit-Miniaturen in Conton City.
description.italian: Interagisci con tutte le miniature temporali a Conton City.
description.japanese: 全ての転送先を解放した！
description.polish: Wejdź w interakcję ze wszystkimi Miniaturami Czasu.
description.russian: Взаимодействуйте со всеми Временными Миниатюрами на всех базах.
description.schinese: 解开全部可传送的地点！
description.spanish: Interactúa con todas las miniaturas temporales en Conton City.
description.tchinese: 解開全部可傳送的地點！

displayName.brazilian: Olá!
displayName.french: Bonjour !
displayName.japanese: ハロー！
displayName.schinese: 哈啰！
displayName.tchinese: 哈囉！

description.german: Dem Kame House einen Besuch abgestattet.
description.japanese: カメハウスにお邪魔した！
description.spanish: Visita Kame House.

displayName.brazilian: Num Foguete Construído Pra Uma Pessoa?
displayName.english: In a Rocket Built For One Person?

displayName.german: In einer Rakete für eine Person?

displayName.polish: W rakiecie skonstruowanej dla jednej osoby?
displayName.schinese: 你要一人用的船吗？
displayName.spanish: ¿En un cohete para una sola persona?
displayName.tchinese: 你要一人用的船嗎？

description.brazilian: Usar um veículo.
description.japanese: フロートに乗った！
description.spanish: Móntate en un vehículo.

displayName.brazilian: Super Saiyajin Deus Super Saiyajin
displayName.french: Super Saiyen Blue
displayName.japanese: 超サイヤ人ゴッドのパワーを持ったサイヤ人の超サイヤ人なんだな～
displayName.koreana: 초사이어인 갓의 파워를 지닌 사이어인의 초사이어인이란 건가~
displayName.schinese: 是拥有超级赛亚人之神力量的赛亚人变身的超级赛亚人啊
displayName.tchinese: 是擁有超級賽亞人之神力量的賽亞人變身的超級賽亞人啊

description.brazilian: Atingir o nível 80.
description.japanese: LVを80まで上げた！
description.spanish: Alcanza el nivel 80.

displayName.brazilian: Você é Como o Filho Que Nunca Tive...
displayName.english: You're Like the Son I Never Had...
displayName.french: Tu es le fils que je n'ai jamais eu...
displayName.german: Du bist der Sohn, den ich niemals hatte ...
displayName.italian: Sei come il figlio che non ho mai avuto...
displayName.japanese: きさまといた数カ月 わるくなかったぜ…
displayName.koreana: 너와 함께한 몇 달간, 나쁘지 않았다…
displayName.polish: Jesteś jak syn, którego nigdy nie miałem...
displayName.russian: Ты как сын, которого у меня никогда не было
displayName.schinese: 和你相处的这几个月还算不赖……
displayName.spanish: Eres como el hijo que nunca tuve...
displayName.tchinese: 和你相處的這幾個月還算不賴……

displayName.tchinese: 拜拜　XENOVERSE

description.spanish: ¡Has obtenido todos los logros!

description.brazilian: Atinja o nível 99.

description.japanese: LV99になったことを褒め称えられた！
description.spanish: Alcanza el nivel 99.

displayName.brazilian: Esse é o novo Super Saiyajin Azul!
displayName.english: This is the New Super Saiyan Blue!
displayName.french: C’est le nouveau Super Saiyen Blue !
displayName.german: Das ist der neue Super-Saiyajin Blue!
displayName.italian: Questo è il nuovo Super Saiyan Blue!
displayName.japanese: これが最新の超サイヤ人ブルーだ
displayName.polish: To jest nowy Super Saiyanin Blue!
displayName.russian: Вот он, новый Синий Супер Сайян!
displayName.schinese: 这就是最新的超级赛亚人蓝
displayName.spanish: ¡Este es el nuevo Super Saiyan Blue!
displayName.tchinese: 這就是最新的超級賽亞人藍

description.brazilian: Consiga 70 bonecos diferentes no Coliseu dos Heróis e converse com Oshi.
description.english: Collected 70 different Hero Colosseum figures and reported to Oshi.
description.french: Collecter 70 figurines différentes à utiliser dans le Colisée des Héros et parler à Oshi.
description.german: 70 verschiedene Figuren im Heldenkolosseum gesammelt und dann mit Oshi gesprochen.
description.italian: Ottieni 70 miniature diverse nel Colosseo degli eroi e parla con Oshi.
description.japanese: ヒーローコロシアムで使用するフィギュアを70種類集めたことを褒め称えられた！
description.koreana: 히어로 콜로세움에서 사용하는 피규어를 70종류 모아 칭찬받았다!
description.polish: Zebrano 70 różnych figurek Koloseum Bohaterów i zameldowano Oshiemu.
description.russian: Собрано 70  разных фигурок для Колизея героев и сообщено Оси.
description.schinese: 收集到70种英雄竞技场使用的人物模型，所以被称赞了！
description.spanish: Reúne 70 figuras distintas del Coliseo de héroes y habla con Oshi.
description.tchinese: 收集到70種英雄競技場使用的人物模型，所以被稱讚了！

displayName.brazilian: Essa dor me deixará mais forte!
displayName.english: This Pain Will Make Me Stronger!
displayName.french: La douleur me rend plus fort !
displayName.german: Dieser Schmerz wird mich stärker machen!
displayName.italian: Il dolore mi renderà più forte!
displayName.japanese: この痛みが また わたしを強くする！
displayName.koreana: 이 고통이 또 나를 강하게 해준다!
displayName.polish: Ten ból sprawi, że będę silniejszy!
displayName.schinese: 这阵痛楚　会让我变得更强！
displayName.tchinese: 這陣痛楚　會讓我變得更強！

description.brazilian: Complete as Missões Paralelas de 113 a 117.
description.italian: Completa le missioni parallele dalla 113 alla 117.
description.japanese: パラレルクエスト(No.113～No.117)を全てクリアした！
description.schinese: No. 113到No. 117的平行任务全部完成了！
description.spanish: Completa las misiones secundarias 113-117.
description.tchinese: No. 113到No. 117的平行任務全部完成了！

displayName.brazilian: Estou apenas exercendo a justiça de um deus.
displayName.english: I am Only Following a God's Sense of Justice
displayName.french: Je suis fidèle au sens de la justice divine
displayName.german: Ich folge nur der göttlichen Gerechtigkeit.
displayName.italian: Seguo solo il senso di giustizia degli dei
displayName.japanese: わたしは 神の正義に従うまで
displayName.schinese: 我只是遵从神的正义
displayName.spanish: Solo obedezco la justicia de un dios.
displayName.tchinese: 我只是遵從神的正義

description.brazilian: Complete todas as aulas do Zamasu.
description.french: Terminer toutes les leçons de Zamasu.
description.italian: Completa tutte le lezioni di Zamasu.
description.japanese: ザマスの授業を全て修了した！
description.schinese: 和扎马斯完成全部的修练了！
description.spanish: Completa todas las lecciones de Zamas.
description.tchinese: 和扎馬斯完成全部的修練了！

displayName.brazilian: Não vou ter pressa com você. Tome cuidado.
displayName.english: I'll Take My Time With You. Watch Your Back.
displayName.french: Je serai patient avec toi. Reste en alerte.
displayName.german: Für dich nehm ich mir Zeit. Sei gewarnt.
displayName.italian: Ora mi divertirò con te. Stai in guardia.
displayName.japanese: のんびり殺すとする…常に背後に気をつけろ
displayName.koreana: 천천히 죽이도록 하지… 항상 등 뒤를 조심해라
displayName.polish: Nie będę się spieszył. Uważaj na siebie.
displayName.russian: Я не стану спешить. Будь начеку.
displayName.schinese: 我不急着杀你……随时小心你的背后
displayName.spanish: Me tomaré mi tiempo contigo. Ten cuidado.
displayName.tchinese: 我不急著殺你……隨時小心你的背後

description.brazilian: Complete as Missões Paralelas de 113 a 117 com Ranking Z.
description.english: Complete Parallel Quests 113 to 117 with a Z Rank.
description.french: Terminer les quêtes parallèles 113 à 117 au rang Z.
description.german: Parallel-Quests 113 bis 117 mit Rang Z abgeschlossen.
description.italian: Completa le missioni parallele dalla 113 alla 117 con il rango Z.
description.japanese: パラレルクエスト(No.113～No.117)を全てZランクでクリアした！
description.koreana: 패럴렐 퀘스트(No.113~No.117)을 모두 Z 랭크로 클리어했다!
description.polish: Ukończ zadania równoległe od 113 do 117 z rangą Z.
description.russian: Выполните параллельные задания с 113-го по 117-е с рейтингом Z.
description.schinese: 以Z Rank完成No. 113到No. 117全部的平行任务！
description.spanish: Completa las misiones secundarias 113-117 con rango Z.
description.tchinese: 以Z Rank完成No. 113到No. 117全部的平行任務！

displayName.brazilian: Foi uma boa luta. Não me arrependo de nada.
displayName.english: It Was a Good Fight. I Have...No Regrets...
displayName.french: C'était un beau combat... aucun regret...
displayName.german: Ein guter Kampf. Ich bereue ... nichts ...
displayName.polish: To była dobra walka. Niczego, nie żałuje...
displayName.russian: Славная была битва. Я... не... жалею...
displayName.schinese: 这是场不错的战斗……我没有……遗憾……
displayName.tchinese: 這是場不錯的戰鬥……我沒有……遺憾……

description.brazilian: Concluiu todas as histórias e Batalhas Livres no Coliseu dos Heróis.
description.english: Finished all stories and Free Battles in the Hero Colosseum.
description.french: Terminé toutes les histoires et tous les combats libres dans le Colisée des Héros.
description.german: Alle Geschichten und Freie Kämpfe im Heldenkolosseum abgeschlossen.
description.italian: Completa tutte le storie e le battaglie libere nel Colosseo degli eroi
description.koreana: 히어로 콜로세움의 시나리오와 프리 대전을 모두 클리어한 것을 칭찬받았다!
description.polish: Ukończono wszystkie opowieści i walki dowolne w Koloseum Bohaterów.
description.russian: Завершены все истроии и открытые бои в Колизее героев.
description.schinese: 完成所有英雄竞技场的剧情以及自由对战，所以被称赞了！
description.spanish: Has terminado todas las historias y combates libres del Coliseo de héroes.
description.tchinese: 完成所有英雄競技場的劇情以及自由對戰，所以被稱讚了！

displayName.brazilian: Todos vocês, concedam-me seu poder!
displayName.french: Envoyez-moi votre puissance !
displayName.schinese: 大家　把力量借给我吧！
displayName.tchinese: 大家　把力量借給我吧！

description.brazilian: Aprendeu um Ataque Máximo Duplo de todos os instrutores (exceto Hit, Bojack e Zamasu).
description.english: Learned a Dual Ultimate Attack from all instructors (excluding Hit, Bojack, and Zamasu).
description.french: Appris une attaque ultime double auprès de tous les entraîneurs (sauf Hit, Bojack et Zamasu).
description.german: Einen Doppelangriff von jedem Ausbilder gelernt (außer Hit, Bojack und Zamasu).
description.italian: Hai appreso un Attacco Supremo Doppio da tutti gli insegnanti (tranne Hit, Bojack e Zamasu).
description.koreana: 선생님 모두에게서 크로스 궁극기를 습득한 것을 칭찬받았다!(히트・보자크・자마스 제외)
description.polish: Opanowano podwójny atak ostateczny od wszystkich instruktorów (poza Hitem, Bojackiem i Zamasu).
description.russian: Изучены парные абсолютные атаки со всем учителями (кроме Хита, Боджака и Замасу).
description.schinese: 学会全部老师的交叉究极技，所以被称赞了！（希特、波吉克、扎马斯除外）
description.spanish: Has aprendido un Ataque Definitivo dual de todos los instructores (excepto Hit, Bojack y Zamas).
description.tchinese: 學會全部老師的交叉究極技，所以被稱讚了！（希特、波吉克、扎馬斯除外）

displayName.brazilian: E este... é o Vegito Azul!
displayName.french: Et voici... Vegeto Blue !
displayName.schinese: 然后　这就是贝吉特蓝！
displayName.tchinese: 然後　這就是貝吉特藍！

description.brazilian: Transformou-se em Super Saiyajin Deus Super Saiyajin.
description.english: Transformed into a Super Saiyan God Super Saiyan.
description.italian: Hai eseguito la trasformazione in Super Saiyan Blue.
description.polish: Dokonano przemiany w Super Saiyanina Blue.
description.schinese: 变身成超级赛亚人之神的超级赛亚人了！
description.spanish: Te has transformado en un Super Saiyan Blue.
description.tchinese: 變身成超級賽亞人之神的超級賽亞人了！

displayName.brazilian: Que tal essa cor? Não é bonita?
displayName.english: How About This Color? Is it not Beautiful?
displayName.french: Et cette couleur ? N’est-ce pas magnifique ?
displayName.italian: Che ne dici di questo colore? Non è bello?
displayName.polish: A co z tym kolorkiem? Czyż nie jest piękny?
displayName.russian: Как тебе этот цвет? Разве он не прекрасен?
displayName.schinese: 怎么样？　这颜色很美吧？
displayName.spanish: ¿Qué opinas de este color? ¿No es precioso?
displayName.tchinese: 怎麼樣？　這顏色很美吧？

description.brazilian: Complete as Missões Paralelas de 118 a 122.
description.italian: Completa le missioni parallele dalla 118 alla 122.
description.schinese: No. 118到No. 122的平行任务全部完成了！
description.spanish: Completa las misiones secundarias 118-122.
description.tchinese: No. 118到No. 122的平行任務全部完成了！

displayName.brazilian: Venere-o! Adore-o!
displayName.french: Vénérez-le ! Adorez-le !
displayName.schinese: 献上敬意吧！　启口赞扬吧！
displayName.tchinese: 獻上敬意吧！　啟口讚揚吧！

description.brazilian: Concluiu as duas linhas do tempo na História Extra.
description.english: Completed both timelines in the Extra Story.
description.french: Terminé les deux chronologies dans l'histoire supplémentaire.
description.italian: Hai completato entrambe le linee temporali nella Storia extra.
description.polish: Ukończono obie linie czasu w dodatkowej opowieści.
description.russian: Завершены обе версии событий в дополнительной истории.
description.schinese: 完成特别剧情的2段历史！
description.spanish: Has completado las líneas temporales de la Historia extra.
description.tchinese: 完成特別劇情的2段歷史！

displayName.brazilian: Minha Força Só Vai Aumentar!
displayName.french: Je vais devenir encore plus fort !
displayName.schinese: 我还可以变得更强！
displayName.tchinese: 我還可以變得更強！

description.brazilian: Apelido adquirido: ∞
description.spanish: Apodo obtenido: ∞
